1547562197_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
Please keep in mind that your device is _old_ and guides on it are usually not maintained anymore. If you are a complete beginner and this is your only phone I would not recommend you trying this.
However if you want to give it a shot, a quick search for "cyanogenmod install galaxy s2" will give you plenty of sites with installation instructions.
